mapper.sql: id, bundleId, names, gjc, qd, number, sjnumber, taskTime, appstoreId, changeTime, cusId, cusMess, type, taskType, clicks, points, appurl, isEnd, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, r7
mapper.select: select id,bundleId,names,gjc,qd,number,taskTime,appStoreId,changeTime,cusId,cusMess,d.c as r1, c.cc as r2, r3,r4,r5,type,taskType,clicks,points,appurl,isEnd,sjnumber,r6,r7 from sj_task t left join (select count(*) c,taskId from sj_task_detail group by taskId) d on t.id=d.taskId LEFT JOIN (select count(*) cc,taskId from sj_task_detail where r2=1 group by taskId) c on t.id=c.taskId where changeTime like '${changeTime}%'

select id,bundleId,names,gjc,qd,number,taskTime,appStoreId,changeTime,cusId,cusMess,d.c as r1, c.cc as r2, r3,r4,r5,type,taskType,clicks,points,appurl,isEnd,sjnumber,r6,r7 from sj_task t left join (select count(id) c,taskId from sj_task_detail group by taskId) d on t.id=d.taskId LEFT JOIN (select count(id) cc,taskId from sj_task_detail where r2=1 group by taskId) c on t.id=c.taskId order by t.id DESC LIMIT 30

select t.*, (case when isnull(tt.csjnumber)=1 then 0 else tt.csjnumber end) r1, (case when isnull(tth.csjnumber)=1 then 0 else tth.csjnumber end) as r2 from ( select id,names,sjnumber,number,SUBSTR(changeTime,1,10) as changeTime,taskType,r5 from sj_task where r3=0 ) t left join (select sum(sjnumber) csjnumber,SUM(number) cnumber,SUBSTR(changeTime,1,10) as changeTime ,taskType from sj_task where r3=0 and sjnumber>0 and taskType=0 group by SUBSTR(changeTime,1,10) order by changeTime desc ) tt on t.changeTime=tt.changeTime left join (select sum(sjnumber) csjnumber,SUM(number) cnumber,SUBSTR(changeTime,1,10) as changeTime ,taskType from sj_task where r3=0 and sjnumber>0 and taskType=1 group by SUBSTR(changeTime,1,10) order by changeTime desc ) tth on t.changeTime=tth.changeTime where 0=0
and t.changeTime like '${d1}%' order by t.changeTime desc
and t.changeTime between #{d1} and #{d2} order by t.changeTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into sj_task (id, bundleId, names, gjc, qd, number, sjnumber, taskTime, appstoreId, changeTime, cusId, cusMess, type, taskType, clicks, points, appurl, isEnd, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, r7) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bundleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tasktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appstoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusmess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tasktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{points,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r7,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sj_task
id,
bundleId,
names,
gjc,
qd,
number,
sjnumber,
taskTime,
appstoreId,
changeTime,
cusId,
cusMess,
type,
taskType,
clicks,
points,
appurl,
isEnd,
r1,
r2,
r3,
r4,
r5,
r6,
r7,

#{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sj_task
bundleId = #{bundleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
names = #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gjc = #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qd = #{qd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sjnumber = #{sjnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taskTime = #{tasktime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
appstoreId = #{appstoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
changeTime = #{changetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cusId = #{cusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cusMess = #{cusmess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taskType = #{tasktype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
points = #{points,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appurl = #{appurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isEnd = #{isend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r1 = #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r2 = #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r3 = #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r4 = #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r5 = #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r6 = #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r7 = #{r7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sj_task set bundleId = #{bundleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, names = #{names,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gjc = #{gjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qd = #{qd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjnumber = #{sjnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taskTime = #{tasktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, appstoreId = #{appstoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, changeTime = #{changetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cusId = #{cusid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusMess = #{cusmess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taskType = #{tasktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, points = #{points,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appurl = #{appurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isEnd = #{isend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r1 = #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r2 = #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r3 = #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r4 = #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r5 = #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r6 = #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r7 = #{r7,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
